name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PokeTab - Pokemon in your New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows pokemon sprites moving around the screen when opening a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I love pixel art and the art of mainline pokemon games that use sprites. This extension is here to share my passion with others who feel the same way. Want to bring some fun to your new tabs by having pokemon sprites flying around them? Then try this!

After you have enjoyed watch your pocket monsters go, you can click anywhere on the screen to open up the options panel and tinker with more possibilities.

All pokemon up to and including Generation IX are supported!

Credits:
Smogon Sprite Project for Generation VI - VIII sprites
kingofthe-x-roads@DeviantArt for Generation IX sprites

Changelog:
1.1.2
- Fixed bug with randomise function clearing canvas if the selected box isn't the currently used box
- Compressed all pokemon sprites from 14MB total to 4MB Yay!

1.1.1
Remove duplicate Melmetal

1.1.0
- Added Generation IX Pokemon. This means all pokemon up to and including Gen IX are supported! Woo!
- Added missing pokemon from Generation VIII (Gigantamax, Hisuian and Origin forms)

1.0.10
- Add alolan form pokemon
- Add Generation VIII Pokemon

1.0.9
- Fixed a bug with added pokemon not showing on canvas with "Always random on new tab" option enabled

1.0.8
-  Add Generation VII Pokemon

1.0.7
- Fixed a bug with box operations not working after box 1 is selected
- Fixed a bug with newly added pokemon not overriding pokemon in randomized box
